page.title: 15Bawtry F.E.Centre & Library
page.content: Bawtry library is housed in a modern,attractive one-story building and is a branch of Doncaster Library. It is open 5 days a week and the services offered include the lending of books,tapes and records and a story reading session for pre-school children.There is a car park in the front of the building. Behind the library is the former school built in 1821.It was financed by public subscription and enlarged by the School Board in 1888.It is now used for Further Education courses such as yoga,car maintenance,dress- making,painting and dancing.Sessions are in the morning,afternoon and evening during the week and occasional all day Saturday courses are held.
